name: Prop Hunt Online TPS Shooter
description:
Best MMOTPS 3D (Multi player Online Third-Person Shooter) Game

You can hide as a prop or become a hunter. You will play Hide and Seek.

As a Prop, you can use any object in the map to hide as a prop (car, phone booth, fire hydrant,...) and survive until the end of the round.

As a Hunter, you need to find and kill props. You can also use grenades.

Awesome Features of Shooting Prop Multiplayer:
- 100% Free
- Amazing gamemod
- Beautiful gameplay
- Chat Instantly in the game
- Use any object to hide
- Play with your friends
- Kill as many enemies as possible
- Unique gaming experience
- Online multiplayer experience up to 8 players
- Challenge your friends or play against random enemies
- 3D Realtime Multiplayer

Download Now Prop Hunt for Free!
